comment: This review is for an online course on macroeconomics. My experience with professor Hariharan was not good. I personally did not feel like a learn something during his course and this is a subject I was interested on learning. Everything we had were videos reading slides and that's it. I wish this was more dynamic than just a grade to submit.

Dr. Hariharan limits himself to read the PowerPoint slides. He barely explains the graphs. His exams are difficult, dont have anything to do with the reviews. He mentioned the formulas the class before the exam! Be careful and review your tests, he makes mistakes grading  them. Nice person but doesnt know how to teach.

He only gives 4 exams, at least for summer session. The lowest exam grade is dropped and theyre all weighted equally. I should have failed this class based on the grades I got, but I went to his office 2 or 3 times and I studied like crazy and went over practice exams with him so he saw my effort and just wanted me to pass so I got a C.

Dr. Hariharan is really nice. His class is very interesting and useful. There is no group project. You need to do all the homeworks and take home exams your own.  I really learned a lot from this class.
Good Economics class. Very Excel based and assignments aren't too bad, just get them done. Recommended
